350540.name: Helicopter 2015: Natural Disasters
350540.description:
Become a true hero! This breathtaking flight simulator lets you become a lifesaving pilot. You are put right into the cockpit of an emergency helicopter and being able to accomplish more than 40 challenging missions that feature multiple goals in a brand new area. It’s time to take off!

  • 5 new helicopters with different specs
  • Over 100 square kilometers of terrain
  • More than 40 varied missions
  • Changing weather conditions
  • Well-balanced flight controls
  • Fully configurable controller support
350540.supported_languages: 英语, 法语, 意大利语, 德语, 西班牙语 - 西班牙, 捷克语, 匈牙利语
